attributes.action: refund the capital losses caused by the potentially increased VED charges on cars bought prior to 12 March 2008,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent budgetry proposal to double the Vehicle Excise Duty (VED) on some types of cars registered from 2001 onwards has meant that many cars have been made almost worthless on the secondhand market. This will mean hardship for those on low incomes and pensioners. I petition the Government to set aside sufficient money to recompense the owners of such cars for their loss and/or provide assistance for those owners to sell the cars to a Government agency at a fair price (based on their previous depreciation history) to enable less polluting cars to be bought.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
